My proven track record encompasses developing and optimizing **RESTful APIs** and **GraphQL** for seamless integration and data handling. I am well-versed in **Angular**, **Vue**, **SQL**, **MongoDB**, and **CosmosDB** for comprehensive full stack development. With a focus on delivering high-quality solutions aligned with business objectives, I bring a robust technical foundation and a proactive approach to problem-solving.
